title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Expanding the Scope of Instructional Design and Technology Post-Pandemic

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and experience operating online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five core concepts in instructional design post-pandemic
Learners can compare and analyze macro/micro-level instructional design approaches and apply them to corporate language education
Learners can interpret literature mapping research findings and propose technology-enhanced learning environment strategies to improve learner engagement
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
